title: Evening Poem
text:
At dusk all the bees are in their beds
little white flowers spread over the grass
look like flecks of cocaine
soon to be hoovered up by my lawnmower
I am the stillness of the trees
and the whir of the motorway
I am the little bats
that dance around my resting head
their little wings nodding at the dead

title: Two Lonely Children
text:
You are all talk
I'm all talk too
we dance
and dance
until our heads are spinning
just for a chance
tos say that we're winning
don't look inside
to what we cover up
 two lonely children
in our hearts
are stuck

title: Father's Day Poem
text:
To Dad
I write the cursive in the card
free and easy
happy father's day
I don't elaborate
I know you're understated
and you'll feel it
even the way
I sign my brother's name
like he did it himself
it is all done
with love

Dogs bark
the day goes dark
clouds part
attention sparks
the great unknown
in my little heart
a squeeky fart
is a false start
I've shat myself

title: Watching Old Videos
text:
watching
old videos of
myself
and Tom
and Dom
and laughing so hard
at our old house
and Tom

my Mum said
"you should have both gone
to drama school"
and she's right
but instead
I'll hold
 on to all
 of us laughing
together

title: The Night Blue Sky
text:
the night blue sky
and the gentle leaves
I write to see
I write to see
something changed
inside of me
when I wrote plain words
with a cup of tea
I step outside
to the quiet breeze
and at last I see
the night blue sky
and the gentle leaves
